newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK XIOSBANK KEEPS LENDING RATES UNCHANGED.
newsitem.headline: GREEK XIOSBANK KEEPS LENDING RATES UNCHANGED.

text.p: Greece's Xiosbank, which recently completed a 4.4 billion drachma IPO, will keep its business credit loan rate unchanged at 17.0 percent from May 26 to June 1, it said in a statement.
Its XiosAlma deposit account which pays interest monthly will offer an annual yield of 9.65 percent over the same period, it said. --Angelos Kiosklis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
